title: Watch: CCTV shows suspects make off with stolen Matisse artworks in Brazil
subtitle: Brazilian officials say thieves held up a security guard and an elderly couple before making off with the artworks, including some by the famed French artist Henri Matisse.
full_text: Brazilian officials say thieves held up a security guard and an elderly couple before making off with the artworks, including some by the famed French artist Henri Matisse.
